Uses of Class
edu.cnm.deepdive.model.Card

  • Packages that use Card 
    Package Description
    edu.cnm.deepdive.model
    Model class implementing fundamental attributes and behaviors required by almost any program that employs standard playing cards.

    • Uses of Card in edu.cnm.deepdive.model

      Methods in edu.cnm.deepdive.model that return Card 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Card Stock.draw()
      Removes and returns a single Card from the deck.
      protected Card Pile.remove()
      Removes and returns the first card in the pile, or null if the pile is empty.
      Methods in edu.cnm.deepdive.model that return types with arguments of type Card 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected List<Card> Pile.getCards()
      Returns a reference to the underlying List of cards.
      protected List<Card> Stock.getDrawn()
      Returns a reference to the collection of Card instances drawn from this stock since instantiation or the most recent invocation of Stock.gather().
      Iterator<Card> Pile.iterator()  
      Methods in edu.cnm.deepdive.model with parameters of type Card 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void Pile.add​(Card card)
      Adds the specified Card to this pile of cards.
